titlestmt.titleproper: Marin County AIDS Advisory Commission records
Marin County AIDS Advisory Commission Records
titlestmt.author: Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender Historical Society

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Marin County AIDS Advisory Commission records

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender Historical Society

did.abstract: This collection contains records produced by the Marin County AIDS Advisory Commission (MAAC) and documents one aspect of the county’s official response to AIDS. The collection includes organizational records; correspondence and memos; meeting agendas and minutes for various committees; reports; subject files; ephemera; and clippings.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Funding for processing this collection was provided by the Council on Library and Information Resources (CLIR).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Marin County AIDS Advisory Commission records. Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender Historical Society

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Roy Bateman, on behalf of the County of Marin, in January 2006 and September 2008.

bioghist.head: Biography/Administrative History
bioghist.p: The Advisory Commission was established in 1987 to advise the Marin County Department of Health and Human Services and Board of Supervisors on the development, implementation and coordination of AIDS programs and other concerns related to HIV.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records produced by the Marin County AIDS Advisory Commission (MAAC) and documents one aspect of the county’s official response to AIDS. The collection includes organizational records; correspondence and memos; meeting agendas and minutes for various committees; reports; subject files; ephemera; and clippings. Of particular interest are the records produced by the Marin County AIDS Task Force (MAAC), which was formed in 1985 in response to the growing AIDS epidemic in Marin. There are also records related to the Marin County HIV Care Consortium and the Marin AIDS Project.

item.extref: Container List for the Marin County AIDS Advisory Commission Records
